name: consists
description: Test if collections consist of the same members.
author: Jeff Hanson

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run browserify-test && npm run uglify
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/test
scripts.test-watch: npm run lint && npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/test --watch
scripts.test-browser: npm run lint && npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/test && open test/test.html
